editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Pantry, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Welcome to this exquisite 4,765 square foot home in the Gated Community of Arden Park. This home has been meticulously cared for by the original owners, and is now being offered as your best opportunity in Chandler. Not often do you find a home that offers everything for everyone. There are 5 large bedrooms and 3 bath, with a bedroom and bath on the main floor. Separate living and family rooms offer the perfect setting for entertaining, or just great fun in the huge Great room. A gourmet kitchen with Granite counters and a separate Butler's pantry would put a smile on any chef looking for tons of cabinets and ample Island counter space. Upstairs shares a separate game, or media room with surround sound, entertainment area, and more space for all those personal game room items. There's even a Jimmy Choo shoe room for those Lady's in need of lots of personal space. The expansive master bedroom has its own sitting area, a lavish bathroom, separate sink areas, and separate his and her closets. The roomy staggered 3 car garage is large by itself, but still offers a covered Porte-Cochere for those weekend projects. Out back is an over sized park-like yard featuring an expanded covered patio, Sparkling heated pool, and raised spa. The built in Barbecue is just another example of a home with amenities for everyone, and everything for all. Located in Chandler's popular Ocotillo area with plenty of shopping, restaurants, and freeway access nearby. Call The Pete Dijkstra Team Today! 480-812-9200 PIN #3040
